EmailTemplate.name: RE: Welcome to MBO Access! Your Exclusive Invite to our Networking Community (13
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Welcome to MBO Access! Your Exclusive Invite to our Networking Community (1340640436.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Mara, I apologize on behalf of MBO that your experience with us was not a pleasant one. From what I can recall working with you was always a pleasure, your response comes as bit of a surprise to me – I personally thought you enjoyed using our services and even used us for multiple clients. If there was something particular that turned you off to MBO (insurance, taxes, expenses, etc), I would love to know so we can continue to improve – if not that’s okay too. I’ve removed you from future promotional or marketing emails. Regards, Sara From: mara smalley [mailto:ms@marasmalley.com] Sent: Friday, June 22, 2012 4:41 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: re: Welcome to MBO Access! Your Exclusive Invite to our Networking Community Hi Sara,
My experience with MBO Partners was a nightmare.
In my opinion, MBO is a barely-legal company that takes advantage of freelancers whom are new to the market. I always tell fellow freelancers to never work with MBO, based on my terrible experiences, and will continue to do so.
Please remove me from you promotional list and any future email lists from MBO.
Mara www.marasmalley.com <http://www.marasmalley.com>From: "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> Sent: Wednesday, June 20, 2012 11:03 AM To: ms@marasmalley.com <mailto:ms@marasmalley.com> Subject: Welcome to MBO Access! Your Exclusive Invite to our Networking Community Dear Damara, I am very pleased to share some exciting news with you! Announced in a recent press release <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPW1ib0JldGFjdXN0LTIzMjItNDYxOC0xLTE2NTItcHJvZC04MzgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTAmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD04Mzgmc2VyaWFsPTEyOTkyNzQ4OTgmZW1haWxpZD1tc0BtYXJhc21hbGxleS5jb20mdXNlcmlkPTM4NDg4LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20120619006336/en/MBO-Partners-Launches-Private-Social-Business-Platform?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokuK7LZKXonjHpfsX74%2BglUbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YUETtQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>, MBO Partners launched a new, free online networking platform called MBO Access. You are cordially invited to participate in this exclusive community. What is MBO Access? Click Here to View 3-Minute Video Tutorial <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPW1ib0JldGFjdXN0LTIzMjItNDYxOC0xLTE2NTItcHJvZC04MzgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTAmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD04Mzgmc2VyaWFsPTEyOTkyNzQ4OTgmZW1haWxpZD1tc0BtYXJhc21hbGxleS5jb20mdXNlcmlkPTM4NDg4LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://c967757.r57.cf2.rackcdn.com/acctutorial.html?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokuK7LZKXonjHpfsX74%2BglUbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YUETtQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> MBO Access is an online private community that was built to enable you, to better and more easily network with other Associates, Alumni, and with major MBO Clients. You will also find rich resources, special promotions and information leading to potential new projects and various opportunities – targeted to your specific industries and geographical locations.
A three-month study commissioned by MBO conducted prior to the development of MBO Access revealed that the path to a new project is typically driven by a personal introduction to someone with contacts in the right field or company. Based on our findings, we invested in creating a robust, intuitive system tailored specifically to your needs as an Independent consultant.
How can I get started? In an effort to get you quickly acclimated with MBO Access, we have created a 3 minute video tutorial <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPW1ib0JldGFjdXN0LTIzMjItNDYxOC0xLTE2NTItcHJvZC04MzgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTAmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD04Mzgmc2VyaWFsPTEyOTkyNzQ4OTgmZW1haWxpZD1tc0BtYXJhc21hbGxleS5jb20mdXNlcmlkPTM4NDg4LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://c967757.r57.cf2.rackcdn.com/acctutorial.html?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokuK7LZKXonjHpfsX74%2BglUbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YUETtQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> to help you get started. Of course, please feel free to contact me directly for a personalized walk through of the new system if that is your preference. Your username for MBO Access will be the same as your MBO Business Center, and the very first time you login, you will need to click “Forgot your password,” to generate a password for you. Click here to login to MBO Access today! <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPW1ib0JldGFjdXN0LTIzMjItNDYxOC0xLTE2NTItcHJvZC04MzgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTAmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD04Mzgmc2VyaWFsPTEyOTkyNzQ4OTgmZW1haWxpZD1tc0BtYXJhc21hbGxleS5jb20mdXNlcmlkPTM4NDg4LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/access?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokuK7LZKXonjHpfsX74%2BglUbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YUETtQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>
Need Assistance? If you have any questions about MBO Access or have a new project to run through MBO, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I encourage you to log in asap, build up your profile and connect with me! I look forward to discussing the site with you, and welcome any feedback. Best Regards,
___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPW1ib0JldGFjdXN0LTIzMjItNDYxOC0xLTE2NTItcHJvZC04MzgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTAmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD04Mzgmc2VyaWFsPTEyOTkyNzQ4OTgmZW1haWxpZD1tc0BtYXJhc21hbGxleS5jb20mdXNlcmlkPTM4NDg4LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokuK7LZKXonjHpfsX74%2BglUbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YUETtQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <http://info.mbopartners.com/Subscription-Management.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokuK7LZKXonjHpfsX74%2BglUbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YUETtQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>
